articles.title: Why now may be the 'golden age' for Southeast Asia start-ups and where the opportunities lie - CNBC
articles.description: Southeast Asia's start-up scene is heating up, and there are many opportunities for entrepreneurs to make it big, says co-founder of Indonesian tech giant GoTo.

Southeast Asia's start-up scene is heating up.

articles.description: PETALING JAYA: Axiata Group Bhd, Telenor Asia Pte Ltd and Digi.Com Bhd have finalised the proposed merger between Celcom Axiata Bhd and Digi, a union that will see the telco giants generating synergies ranging from cost savings to financial flexibility for fu…

articles.author: Delfin Dioquino
articles.title: 'Tough' Kai Sotto impresses Tab Baldwin after first Gilas Pilipinas stint - Rappler
articles.description: Kai Sotto, 19, holds his own against more experienced foes as he helps Gilas Pilipinas sweep the FIBA Asia Cup Qualifiers
articles.content: Sotto's finest game numbers-wise came in their stunning 81-78 victory over Korea, where he churned out 11 points, 7 rebounds, 2 assists, and 1 steal in only 18 minutes.
